title: holiday_schedule
description: This is holiday_schedule object from the hsda-taxonomy service.

id.description: Each entry must have a unique identifier.

service_id.description: The identifier of the service for which this is the holiday schedule.

location_id.description: The identifier of the location for which this is the holiday schedule.

service_at_location_id.description: The identifier of the u2018service at locationu2019 table entry, when this schedule is specific to a service in a particular location.

closed.description: Indicates if a service or location is closed during a public holiday.

opens_at.description: The time when a service or location opens. This should use HH:MM format and should include timezone information, either adding the suffix u2018Zu2019 when the date is in UTC, or including an offset from UTC (e.g. 09:00-05:00 for 9am East Coast Time.

closes_at.description: The time when a service or location closes. This should use HH:MM format and should include timezone information, either adding the suffix u2018Zu2019 when the date is in UTC, or including an offset from UTC (e.g. 09:00-05:00 for 9am East Coast Time.

start_date.description: The first day that a service or location is closed during a public or private holiday.

end_date.description: The last day that a service or location is closed during a public or private holiday.
